name: Flyting!!
description:
Flyting!!
The game of medieval insult battles.

Flyting is a ritual, poetic exchange of insults practiced mainly between the 5th and 16th centuries. (source: wikipedia)

Built as a simple text adventure for the Godot Game Jam Summer 2021 as a fun project to learn Godot with.

As you engage in battles, grow your skill level and knowledge of obscure insults. As you battle harder and harder opponents, the game organically teaches you new terms that you can use in your own insults!

Lots more that can be done with this game concept, for now built something small to learn the Godot engine with.
